title: ICE `add_outlives_bounds: unexpected regions` compiling spki

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code https://github.com/RustCrypto/formats/ ```Rust ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (ab654863c 2023-03-15) binary: rustc commit-hash: ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010 commit-date: 2023-03-15 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
